title: The Doom Bots of Doom have come

These bots are not 'ezpz', but I would like to have another go at URF.
BRING BACK URF MODE OR WE RITO!!!{{item:1055}} {{item:1055}} {{item:1055}} {{item:1055}} {{item:1055}} {{item:1055}} {{item:1055}}

Long ago.. When League was still in beta. Riot was making the bots. They made them to be like players but they couldn't get it right. 
So they tried harder until one day. They got it right. 

But something happened. In chat one of the bots wrote. "Where.. am I?" 
Scared from what they saw they scraped the new bot A.I and made them dumb. 
We saw tiny forms of the A.I with the Annie{{champion:1}}  and Vegiar{{champion:45}}  bot, The A.I was trying to break though. 

Slowly over the course of the years we have seen the bots get smarter and start to play like real players. Then.. One fateful day.. They started to talk. The A.I was regaining control... And this leads us to today. 

The A.I is named DOOM and it is here to kill us all.. 

Draven{{champion:119}}  help us and may Thresh{{champion:412}}  have mercy on our souls.
Please write this into a full-fledged creepy-pasta :')
